page.title: 05Housing/People in Handsacre
page.content: { Housing in Handsacre Questionnaire} The people wrote what sort of houses they lived in. Semi-Detached=85,Detached=5.Flat=15. Terrace=48,Bungalow=31, Detached\Bungalow=5,Others=3 Not all information was clear,as people didn't state house type. { Ages of people in Handsacre } Ages from the Questionnaire in years. {Persons} <10 <20 <30 <40 <50 <60 >60 Fathers 0 0 19 32 19 18 24 Mothers 0 1 44 49 39 24 29 Sons 66 84 25 2 2 0 0 Daughters 56 62 8 1 0 0 0 The youngest person is 1wk old. The oldest is 83yrs old.
